function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transition from self-managing socialism to neoliberal capitalism","Impact":"Erosion of social support systems and potential increase in inequality","Mitigation":"Investment in social safety nets and equitable economic policies","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Society, especially those reliant on social support systems","Owner":"Government, policymakers"},{"Description":"Privatization of spatial and economic resources","Impact":"Displacement of marginalized communities and loss of access to essential resources","Mitigation":"Community land trusts, regulations to protect public spaces, and community-driven development projects","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Marginalized communities, society at large","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Degradation of natural and urban spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of environmental degradation and health risks","Mitigation":"Environmental protection regulations, sustainable urban planning, and community engagement in environmental preservation","Technologies":"Sustainable architecture and urban planning, environmental monitoring technologies","People":"Residents, environmentalists, public health advocates","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"}]}
